original_text: Moreover, he must be well thought of by outsiders, so that he may not fall into disgrace, into a snare of the devil.
korean_text: 또한 외인에게서도 선한 증거를 얻은 자라야 할지니 비방과 마귀의 올무에 빠질까 염려하라

sentences.original_text: he must be well thought of by outsiders,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 외부인들에게 좋은 평판을 받아야 합니다,

sentences.original_text: so that he may not fall into disgrace,
into a snare of the devil.
